--- Kenneth Stanley <kstanley@...> wrote:
> I think one thing that NEAT could really use is a
> nice experimental control interface.  
<snip>
> I can imagine some master GUI 
> interface that kind of combines the ideas from all
> these variants that
> would be extremely useful for running experiments.
> It would be cool to hear about anything like this
> that people have worked on or thought about.

For our implementation, Philip and I are working on a
browser-based interface, basically an HTML form in
which you select the evolutionary parameters, whether
or not you want to persist data, which graphical
information you want to display during the run, etc.  

We liked Ugo's interface, but like you say, it would
be nice to have a more powerful GUI interface where
you can set everything without going back into the
code.

Derek
